description: Looking to satisfy your pasta cravings in a hurry? Try this tuna pasta recipe that's ready in just 15 minutes.
keywords: Pasta,Pescatarian,Tree nut free,Jun 2021,Lemon,Winter,Sesame free,Quick & easy dinner,Soy free,Autumn,Tomato,Peanut free
name: Tuna Pasta with Tomatoes, Olives & Capers Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 425g tuna in oil, drained, oil reserved, tuna flaked
1 red capsicum, halved, deseeded, thinly sliced
1 yellow capsicum, halved, deseeded, thinly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Cook pasta in a large saucepan of boiling, salted water according to packet instructions. Drain, reserving 1/4 cup cooking liquid.
Meanwhile, heat tuna oil in a large, deep frying pan over mediumhigh heat. Cook garlic, capsicums and capers, stirring, for 5 minutes or until capsicums have softened.
Add tomato and olives, then cook for 2 minutes or until warmed through. Add pasta, reserved cooking liquid, lemon juice and tuna, then toss to combine. Season with pepper and serve topped with basil.
